content: slip into this dainty short sleeved sweater perfect for any occasion dress it up with pearls and a skirt for a formal evening or keep it casual with jeans and boots the possibilities are endless with this versatile top this pattern can also be viewed on my blog for free or you can purchase the ad-free printable pdf here **what s included ** 9 page printable pdf download written instructions for women s sizes xs-5x size chart and schematic pictures for visual aid links to step by step video tutorial and stitch tutorial **pattern difficulty ** intermediate **construction of garment ** sweater is worked from the top down with a circular yoke sleeves and trim are added at the end **sizing & yardage ** finished circumference yardage xs 32 760 yards s 36 855 yards m 40 950 yards l 44 1045 yards xl 48 1140 yards 2x 52 1235 yards 3x 56 1330 yards 4x 60 1425 yards 5x 64 1520 yards **yarn ** wecrochet gloss dk in proper pink 7 8 9 10 11 12 12 13 14 balls dk 70% merino wool 30% silk 50g/123yds all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in us terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter 1 1 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
